about_the_game:
Caught in a sandstorm the sand beneath your feet sinks as you fall into the unknown depths bellow. There is (only one path) that leads inside a decrepit Tomb.

Explore dreadful environments

Immerse yourself in dark cave tunnels, architectural tomb halls, unnerving subterranean passages, and many more distinct areas. There are lots of secrets to be found that will reward the perceptive explorer.

Survive with limited resources

Use your weapons, wits or stealth to overcome a variety of vicious creatures with unpredictable AIs and unique behavioral patterns. Make sure to avoid too many stressful encounters, otherwise, your sanity will deteriorate and you will go mad.

avoid the ones who smile

there is an entity that wants you to suffer. Don't let it defeat you. This world can be conquered_#there is no escape. There is only the endless void and sweet relief of death.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support

  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
